item.title: Poetry, Oh to be free
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“Tree, post:16, topic:473849”][quote author=D3i7y link=topic=591782.msg4182536#msg4182536 date=1355706526]
this is the only username i have here and you can check. i was meaning across many different sites. i had one at tobias scape? (dated tobias at tobias scape?) cheatskape?(was staff twice?Love customs)drug scape?(i just remember the portal to the patches that you could smoke the scroll that looked like a blunt.

i didn’t mean to cause any confusion i really am just trying to remember someone that i lost along time ago. i am sorry for posting my poem… i don’t like conflict. i just wish someone would tell me if they remember boy on msn named robby on msn messanger? i used the username d3i7y@live.com years ago and i cant get access to it and i had another one d3i7y@hotmail.com i have lost the password, just close the thread i will keep looking.
[/quote]

I really wish this censor wasn’t here. You aren’t ‘old-school’. You aren’t someone who has been here for ages. Nobody cares about your private servers or what your msn name is. You’re a nobody. I out date you by far.

Your poem was terrible. My penis could scribble something better than that in my sleep.
Just leave.[/quote]
Finally your elitist rude mind get to properly use…

Read full topic

item.title: Poetry, Oh to be free
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

Poor OP

This is now a poetry thread.

Original poster
You deserve to be smacked with a rusty toaster

You stupid twat
You dont deserve my response
I have over 400 confirmed victims dead who lie on cots
I will smack your shit sideways and smear the air with a benevolent ambiance

Stop writing poems
You suck
I giggled and laughed at your attempt at a literate tome
I’ll have your mom put you back to bed and kiss you goodnight before I try my luck

Luck is like a fully filled revolver
There is no losing
Your mom is a penis cobbler
Huehuehuehuehue

Read full topic

item.title: Poetry, Oh to be free
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

this isn’t beautiful

small and large yet they all are free
as if them being either small or large would have some bearing on their freedom "yet" isn't necessary
if only we w[s]h[/s]ere truly free as a beautiful butterfly
free in what sense? in that they can fly around for a little bit and die in a few weeks?

youre just using glittering generalities to make this “poem” sound like some beautiful deep work of art, but its not.

oh, and
[left]this whole thing[/left] [center]that you’re doing right there[/center] [right]with the alignment[/right]
is really annoying.

Read full topic

item.title: Poetry, Oh to be free
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

[quote=“D3i7y, post:1, topic:473849”]I was reading the news about how our freedom is falling into pieces and i love butterflies so i wrote a short poem while i was listening to like we used to by a rocket to the moon!

[center]Butterflies are such beautiful things as they are of many colors, small and large yet they all are free. if only we where truly free as a beautiful butterfly. We would see how the world should really be. as we would be free to fly threw the sky as a beautiful butterfly. we shall see as many try too be like the butterfly as they want to be free.

                                                                                                            Truely Free. as we should be. <3[/center][/quote]

What the fuck.
I don’t know where to even begin with you.

Read full topic
